resources.string: \ Pokédroid Donate is simply an add-on to the free Pokédroid, \ meaning you\'ll still need to install that version in order for it to work. \ Thanks for donating! :)

\ While installed, Pokédroid Donate simply serves as proof you donated, and adds in the shiny sprites. \ This icon will remove itself from your application \ tray the next time you reboot. Thanks for donating - you are awesome! :)
